comments: Also the largest determinant of a 3 X 3 matrix with entries from {0..n}. - _Jud McCranie_, Aug 12 20014*a(n) is a perfect cube.The positive terms comprise the principal diagonal of the convolution array A213821. - _Clark Kimberling_, Jul 04 2012Volume of a pyramid (square base) with side n and height 6*n. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Aug 25 2014
